channel.title: Posts on HubGrep
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on HubGrep

item.title: Status Update CW09 2021
item.description:
After a few weeks of “papierkrieg” we finally started into a prototype fund funded 6 months of HubGrep development!

This is the first post in a series of status update posts, published (hopefully before) every second monday.

item.title: Our Milestones for the next 6 months
item.description: This was part of a our first status post, but i think it makes sense to have it separate.

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
We make a search engine for open source projects!

For many people, GitHub is the only place to go to host, or to look for open source code.
It’s so famous, that for some its even synonymous to to git - a version control system.
